description.en: GoByte is the fastest, most secure & most affordable Proof-of-Work cryptocurrency in the world. Its network features instantly settled & respendable transactions, 51% attack immunity, optionally private transactions and the first decentralized blockchain governance and self-funding model through incentivized full nodes which enable mass adoption scaling.

status_updates.description:
GoByte is 3 years old already! 

We want to thank everyone who has supported the project and invite you to many more exciting years together. 

Join our Discord and Telegram to celebrate!
Discord: https://discord.gg/PFHcjyv
Telegram: https://t.me/gobytenetwork

GoByte is now trading LIVE on Bololex exchange! 💪🏻
Visit https://bololex.com/trading/?symbol=GBX-BTC

🔹 Trade on the GBX/BTC pair 
🔹 Only 0.20% taker fee
🔹 Only 0.02% maker fee
🔹 No KYC or verification
🔹 Withdrawal fees as low as 0.1 GBX

Airdrop for voting has also been distributed, so don’t forget to check it too 😎
#Bololex #GBX #Gobyte #listing

⚠️ Attention everyone. ⚠️ Please withdraw all your GBX from the Coinomi wallet by 28 September. 
You can transfer the funds, or export the private keys by using their tutorial at https://bit.ly/3kD5dvp and then import them into the GoByte Core wallet v0.12.2.4 which you can download here: https://github.com/gobytecoin/gobyte/releases/

👨‍🔧 GoByte Community Announcement 👨‍🔧

The highly anticipated v0.12.3.4 of the GoByte Core wallet is now out on the public testnet.
As you already know, GoByte is a PoW blockchain, hence we are looking for testnet miners.
We are as well looking for testnet masternode operators that can set up, operate and maintain a v0.12.3.4 masternode on the public testnet network.
If you are willing to assist, please join our GoByte Nation discord server for more details. https://discord.gg/kFvetYW

🗳️ GoByte added on Bololex exchange voting list! 🗳️

Don’t waste your weekend. 🤓
⚡ Grab your energy every hour - 🔋 Vote $GBX - ⏰ Earn airdrops 
🔗 Vote using this link: https://bololex.com/voting?currency=GBX

👋🏻 GoByte x CoinGeko 👋🏻

GoByte has now joined the CoinGeko's "Beam Updates" feature.
Make sure to follow GoByte (GBX) on CoinGeko by clicking the star ⭐ button on the coin's page to make sure that you won't miss any updates or announcements.
If you want to be the first to hear the news, join our Discord server or Telegram group using the links below.

Telegram: https://t.me/gobytenetwork
Discord: https://discord.gg/vRbVszC
